app.name: Fridge Magnets
app.long_description: Move magnetic letters about, bit of fun & learning for children Up to 4 Controllers: Shake Wiimote to shake letters Scroll view with direction buttons (A or B) Hold down to pick up (A & B) Drop new Letter (1) Remove highlighted letter (2) Pile up letters (-)/(+) Change camera view zoom (Home) Back to Homebrew Channel
